TopicTitle: [0.90] LazTek SpaceX Launch, Exploration, Colonial Transporter & Historic mods (1/25/14)

Articles.Content:
This mod is so cool! Only one request. MAKE THE IVA'S COOL!!!

Thanks - I've attempted to duplicate the real-world look of the DragonRider and Dragon V2 capsule interiors scaled down to Kerbal size. What would you like to see that would make the interiors better?

Edited September 3, 2014 by LazarusLuan

The HD updates are now up on Mega:

LazTek SpaceX Launch Pack HD 3.1a

LazTek SpaceX Exploration Expansion HD 3.1a

LazTek SpaceX Historic Archive HD 3.1a

>>>>CHANGES IN LAZTEK SPACEX LAUNCH PACK v3.1a:

Added Dragon V1 Cargo capsule and .craft file

Moved necessary support parts for Dragon V1 Cargo ship back from SpaceX Historic Archive mod

Changed cost of original Dragon parts to make them in line with .24 pricing structure

Cleaned up Dragon V2 model and physics for better compatibility with other mods

Added Umbilical to Dragon Trunk V1

Fixed texture issues

>>>>CHANGES TO SPACEX EXPLORATION EXPANSION KIT 2.1a:

Removed parts already in SpaceX Launch Pack 3.1a

>>>>>>> CHANGES TO VERSION 1.1a:

Moved all parts needed for Dragon V1 Cargo ship back to SpaceX Launch Pack

Edited September 3, 2014 by LazarusLuan

The LazTek SpaceX Historic Archive HD 3.1a download link is asking for a key ?

EDIT- The top 2 link work but the Historic pack, I get this Enter decryption key

Edited September 3, 2014 by Mecripp2

The LazTek SpaceX Historic Archive HD 3.1a download link is asking for a key ?

The key is supposed to be included in the link. I just set up this account at Mega, so there might be some issues with those servers. Is anyone else having the same problem?

The key is supposed to be included in the link. I just set up this account at Mega, so there might be some issues with those servers. Is anyone else having the same problem?

Yeah, seeing the problem with the Historic Archive only.

Laz,

Just a heads up, the texture for the engine housing is still not showing up, just the blank white model. Also, Historic Pack is still not able to be downloaded.

And lastly, I don't know if this is possible, but the Dragon Cargo capsule, is it possible to have the default of the pod set to closed with an ability to open it in the VAB? Thanks again for all the work.

Laz,

Just a heads up, the texture for the engine housing is still not showing up, just the blank white model. Also, Historic Pack is still not able to be downloaded.

And lastly, I don't know if this is possible, but the Dragon Cargo capsule, is it possible to have the default of the pod set to closed with an ability to open it in the VAB? Thanks again for all the work.

I think the Mega server simply isn't updating correctly, so I am setting up another account elsewhere. I can make the cargo bay open and close in the VAB, but it will require the Firespitter plugin and I've been trying to stay away from using or needing plugins to make my mods work up to this point.
isn't there a stock module that allows for the cycling of animations in the VAB? couldn't you use that?
No, there isn't. Firespitter is the only way you can do that.
Maybe the IVA can have RPM compatibility and better textures!
Are there any plans for fairings for the Nerva II engine? It looks a bit odd on an upper stage, just bare with a decoupler below it.

Ok - trying a new server with all issues addressed and fixed, hopefully. I will upload the medium and low-res versions right after I can confirm the HD versions download and work correctly:

LazTek SpaceX Launch Pack HD 3.1a

LazTek SpaceX Exploration Expansion HD 2.1a

LazTek SpaceX Historic Archive HD 1.1a

Here are the medium-resolution versions:

LazTek SpaceX Launch Pack 3.1a

LazTek SpaceX Exploration Expansion 2.1a

LazTek SpaceX Historic Archive 1.1a
badass mod:cool:

i have this weird bug with the dragon v2

at launch the pod decouples and there is nothing i can do to stop it

i use a lot of mod but cant think of any that may cause it

Low-res versions are now ready:

LazTek SpaceX Launch Pack LR 3.1a

Edited September 15, 2014 by LazarusLuan

Downloads are working just fine, but the texture for the Merlin engine housing is still not showing, just the pure white model. I'm using the HD pack. Also if you added Deadly Reentry configs to the various heatshields separate from the pods, the ablative shielding is not showing up. Cheers for all the work, Laz.

Hey, could you please create a red stylish version of Dragon spacecraft for duna landing? (so like Red Dragon that isnt accualy out tho...) or add a button to change the texture of it? a new model for it would be nice aswell, u could create a new package of future parts for this mods thanks!
Your download for LazTek SpaceX Historic Archive LR 1.1a is going to the LazTek SpaceX Exploration Expansion LR 2.1a.

Hey LazarusLuan. I like this mod alot. I intend to play this mod with other mods, but unfortunately does not work with all of them and in particular with one mod, the new B9 and this its only that mod fault, and so I was forced to quit on that mod because he works only with very few mods and then it just crash on desktop, CTD like crazy and all I was wanted was a nice shuttle

but I came here for something else with a request

can you replica this supersonic aircraft ussing same great white textures that you used for Spacex ?

will be great if u can and want.

more info about this supersonic craft herem this plane its almost done

http://www.arcaspace.com/en/iar111.htm

Hey LazarusLuan. I like this mod alot. I intend to play this mod with other mods, but unfortunately does not work with all of them and in particular with one mod, the new B9 and this its only that mod fault, and so I was forced to quit on that mod because he works only with very few mods and then it just crash on desktop, CTD like crazy and all I was wanted was a nice shuttle

Interesting - that ship uses the same basic airframe as the Northrop YF-23: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Northrop_YF-23

Your download for LazTek SpaceX Historic Archive LR 1.1a is going to the LazTek SpaceX Exploration Expansion LR 2.1a.

Thanks for catching that.

Love the Dragon V2 and your mod.

There's only one small problem: when you try an EVA the Kerbal gets out facing away from the capsule, which makes him drift away or fall down instantly. And there should probably be a handle on the door they cand hold on to.
Thanks for pointing this out - I've fixed it and will have it working on the next release.
For those who are interested, I've added my SpaceX mods to KerbalStuff.com.
